text: Pope Cyril V of Alexandria (Abba Kyrillos V) (1831-1927) was the 112th Pope of Alexandria from 1874-1927. He was the leader of the Coptic Orthodox Church of Alexandria. He is the longest-serving church official who was been ranked as Pope in history. Category:Patriarchs Category:1831 births Category:1927 deaths Category:Copts
title: Pope Cyril V of Alexandria
